scripts.start: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const cp = require('child_process'); const path = require('path'); console.log('ðŸš€ Starting Microsoft Rewards Bot...'); if (!fs.existsSync('node_modules')) { console.log('ðŸ“¦ Installing dependencies...'); cp.execSync('npm install', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } if (!fs.existsSync('.playwright-chromium-installed')) { console.log('ðŸŒ Installing Chromium browser...'); cp.execSync('npx playwright install chromium --with-deps', {stdio: 'inherit'}); fs.writeFileSync('.playwright-chromium-installed', new Date().toISOString()); } if (!fs.existsSync('dist/index.js')) { console.log('ðŸ”¨ Building TypeScript project...'); cp.execSync('npm run build', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } console.log('âœ… All checks passed! Launching bot...\n'); cp.execSync('node --enable-source-maps ./dist/index.js', {stdio: 'inherit'});"
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.creator: ts-node ./src/account-creation/cli.ts
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop ms-rewards && docker rm ms-rewards
scripts.kill:chrome: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const isWin = process.platform === 'win32'; try { execSync(isWin ? 'taskkill /F /IM chrome.exe 2>nul || exit 0' : 'pkill -f chrome || true', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) {}"
